title: (x) Papyrus font - H&FJ Gotham {Greg Shutters}
content:
Thanks in advance for ID-ing this font. Need a similar font that has both upper and lower case characters.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016030421im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Papyruslogo_4971.jpg)
author: thebuck

comments.content: Looks like H&FJ's "Gotham". It does indeed come in upper and lowercase. With a name like that I'm really glad they didn't actually use the font, "Papyrus"!
Nailed it! Much appreciated GRS. Well stated.
